## **node11**, **node12**: *Optande DC PMEM based nodes* - 1TB 2LM Memory Mode with 1/4 and 1/5 ratios , 
## **node13**, **node14**: *DRAM only nodes* - 300/400 GB of RAM

panels.title: App cache contention sensitivity = (Intenstiy * Utili) / RW
